alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marinette County through 630 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Wausaukee, or 24 miles south of Iron Mountain, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Marinette County, including the following locations...Cedarville and Amberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
